input.name: name
input.label: Technical name
input.help-text: [Optional] Use to customize the name attribute of the input field. This is used to identify the field, e.g. in the receiving system. If left empty, a URI encoded version of Label is used. In other words, characters that are not a-z, A-Z, 0-9, period, dash, or underscore may end up being URI encoded, e.g. "two%20words"
